articles.content: Who doesnt love traveling? Indeed! We all do. Exploring new places, meeting new faces, and then satiating your taste buds with the lip-smacking cuisines of the city. However, among all this, you need… [+3025 chars]

articles.author: Eirik Hyldbakk Furu
articles.title: Marvel avslører fase 5 av MCU - Gamereactor Norge
articles.description: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever og She-Hulk avslutter fjerde fase. Deretter får vi Secret Invasion, Echo, The Marvels, Blade, Ironheart, Agatha, Thunderbolts, Daredevil og mer fra både Ant-Man Guardians of the Galaxy og Captain America.
articles.content:
Det var aldri noen som helst tvil om at Disney ville ha mye å si om Marvel på San Diego Comic-Con, men få hadde turt å håpe på såpass mye.
For selskapet bestemte seg for å annonsere at She-Hulk: Att… [+1251 chars]

articles.title: Polio live oral vaccine: Here's why the US stopped using it years ago - New York Post
articles.description: The new case raises the issue of polio vaccinations — and what Americans should know to protect their health.
articles.content: An unvaccinated Rockland County, N.Y., resident exposed to an individual who received an oral poliovirus vaccine contracted the neurological disease and is now paralyzed, according to Rockland County… [+8096 chars]
